english.segment1: They put on disguises today. To hide the scarlet letters. That each of us has put so far away
english.segment2: In this which trial. Modern day
english.segment3: Despite this it seems that the powers be. Have decided who I am. And who I will be
english.segment4: Who I am who I'll be. Has been decided for me. And they don't even know me
english.segment5: As they pounded in the stake. I thought I heard them say. Become like us or you will be slain
english.segment6: You can't tell me who I am
